projects.name: CourseKrimson: Open Courses
projects.description: CourseKrimson is a beginner-friendly open-source web resource built with React and JavaScript, encouraging contributions and collaboration. Hosted on GitHub Pages under MIT license, it supports learning and open-source community engagement, especially for new developers.

projects.name: Github Profile Analyzer based on Github API
projects.description: A web application that analyzes GitHub profiles using the GitHub API, providing insights into repositories, contributions, and more. The application offers a user-friendly interface for exploring GitHub data.

projects.name: Medium Reads Logger Extension
projects.description: A browser extension for logging and categorizing Medium articles. It allows users to save articles for later reading and organize them into categories.
